items.title: Delta now has free Wi-Fi on 1,000 planes, with rest of fleet coming in 2026
items.description: Delta Air Lines first announced plans to make Wi-Fi free in 2023. It now offers the complimentary service on 1,000 aircraft.

items.title: Hilton expands loyalty program with debut of Hilton Honors Adventures
items.description: Hilton is getting adventurous, introducing new experiences travelers can book with their Hilton Honors points.

items.title: When do travel rewards expire? A guide to expiration policies for popular loyalty programs
items.description: Don't let your points, miles and travel credits go to waste. Learn the expiration rules for popular loyalty programs.
